HeadComp.title: Magento, WooCommerce, OpenCart, WordPress SMS addon plugin - MSG91
HeadComp.description: Wordpress SMS plugin, WooCommerce SMS plugin, OpenCart SMS extension, Magento SMS extension, OpenCart SMS gateway to send unlimited SMS directly from website

IntegrationsComp.heading: Integrations & Add-ons
IntegrationsComp.subheading: Add-ons that enable SMS notifications in your application with a single click.

addon.heading: MSG91 Add-ons for your preferred Platform
addon.subheading: Note – For paid plugins you will receive free credits, depending on the policy.

cards.name: MS Excel
cards.description: MSG91 has created a one stop solution for all MS Excel users to send communication through multiple channels like Text message, Whatsapp, RCS, Emails and Voice Call.
cards.author: By:MSG91

cards.name: FreshWorks
cards.description: Automate your customer communication model by using MSG91! Send customized communications through Email, Text Message, RCS and Whatsapp for Deal/Contact related alerts. Increasing your customer reach with automation and boost sales.
cards.author: By:MSG91

cards.name: Shopify
cards.description: Send customized automated communications through Email, Text Message, RCS and Whatsapp for:Order Related Alerts, Signup Greetings, Abandoned Cart Alerts, Abandoned Checkout Alerts,Order Cancellation Alerts, Refund Alerts, etc
cards.author: By:MSG91

cards.name: Google Sheets
cards.description: MSG91 has created a one stop solution for all Google Spreadsheet users to send communication through multiple channels like Text message, Whatsapp, RCS, Emails and Voice Call.
cards.author: By:MSG91

cards.name: Auth0
cards.description: MSG91 has created a one stop solution for all Auth0 users to send Multi Factor Authentication communication(MFA) through multiple channels like Text message, Whatsapp, RCS, Emails and Voice Call.
cards.author: By:MSG91

cards.name: Pabbly Connect
cards.description: Connect MSG91 with more than 1000+ apps. Just select the app and you're good to go. No installation required!
cards.author: By:MSG91

cards.name: ViaSocket
cards.description: Stop managing servers to build business logics. Use Viasocket as a no-code tool or control the code using low-code script, conditions, and loop to build complex workflows.
cards.author: By:MSG91

cards.name: Clevertap
cards.description: CleverTap is a customer engagement and retention platform that provides the functionality to integrate app analytics and marketing.
cards.author: By:Clevertap

cards.name: Integrately
cards.description: Integrately gives you LOTS of pre-made automations. So you can activate automations in 1 click!
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Magento
cards.description: Notify customers about current order status and available promotions in time and boost their loyalty with Magento 2 SMS Notification Pro extension.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Zoho Flow
cards.description: Zoho Flow is MSG91 plugin that helps with the SMS and Email notifications. Sends an email to the specified recipients, Sends a text message to the specified phone numbers, Creates a contact in the selected group. If the contact exists, the details are updated, Sends an OTP to the selected phone number and Resends an OTP to the selected phone number
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: WHMCS
cards.description: WHMCS SMS add-on allows you to send automated SMS message to your clients on defined actions, such as placing a new order, register, password change, payment status and more. You can even receive alerts as administrator on events.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Vtiger
cards.description: Vtiger is an open source CRM software solutions which offers marketing and service with quotes and sales order processing, inventory/products, billing and project management. Send SMS directly to leads, contacts or accounts via Vtiger SMS plugin.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Ulgebra Integrations
cards.description: Integrate SMS and Whatsapp with Pipedrive CRM, Zoho CRM, Hubspot, Bitrix24, Salesforce, Freshworks, Zendesk, ZohoBooks, Freshdesk, Leadsquared, Shopify, Zoho Recruit, Bigin and MS Excel
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Segment
cards.description: MSG91 provides SMS marketing/transactional automation for businesses. With Segment you can send SMS with a single call. This destination is maintained by MSG91.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: CSCart
cards.description: Placing new order and Shipment information and Order status. We are providing MSG91 APIs which supports all Indian Cell Operators.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Rista Apps
cards.description: Experience the power of the all-in-one platform for restaurants. The only platform that offers multi-channel sales, inventory & marketing on a single enterprise app. Direct & deep integrations with 3rd party, including food aggregators & payment providers, offer speed and high integrity of data transfer across multiple platforms.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: PrestaShop
cards.description: Notify customers by SMS when you update their orders from Order History page. You can associate an order status with a custom template. Notify clients by SMS on new order once they complete the online transaction. Notify clients or admin by SMS on registration
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Tellephant
cards.description: By integrating WhatsApp Business API with MSG91, you’ll be able to reach out to customers through multiple channels. Message your customers via SMS, email, voice call, or WhatsApp through Tellephant.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: LeadSquared
cards.description: It is now possible to integrate MSG91 SMS service with LeadSquared. Send automated and bulk messages to your customers.
cards.author: By: LeadSquared

cards.name: Magento
cards.description: Make your online store more professional using Magento 2 Mobile Login extension by Meetanshi. Allow the customers to register & login on your store and update their mobile number and reset password using OTP in your store.
cards.author: By: Third-Party

cards.name: Tally
cards.description: With Tally you can now send the notifications via Multiple Channels such as WhatsApp and EMails (Coming soon on other channels too). Resolve the use case - like Invoice Generated, Material Dispatch, Outstanding Reminders and lot more by using automations Send Vouchers, Resend Vouchers and Send the Ledger for specific period. For more details please Refer the Help Document.For MSG91 Files for Tally & Support - Connect at 'Support@msg91.com'
cards.author: By: MSG91

cards.name: Zapier
cards.description: Zapier lets you connect MSG91 with thousands of the most popular apps, so you can automate your work and have more time for what matters most—no code required.
cards.author: By: MSG91

section.heading: Don’t see the Add-on or Plugin you are looking for?
section.subtag: We would be glad to add you too.

build.line: All the revenues on the plugin will be yours and it will be your plugin.
We will provide free OTP SMS (one time) to every plug-in users.
Mentoring for developing plug-in for your choice of platform.
We will promote your plugin using Google ad, blogs, mail to all our 40K clients.

card.name: Bharat Kumar
card.content: We are happy partnering with MSG91, the team has been prompt in addressing the queries and taking our partnership ahead. Thank you MSG91

card.name: Prateek Agrawal
card.content: Our long standing Partnership with MSG91 has been very successful. The quality of services and support MSG91 provides is excellent. We have been treated with a positive response every single time.
